org.shared.stat.ml

Class GmModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.stat.ml.AbstractGmModel
      • org.shared.stat.ml.GmModel

  • public class GmModel
extends AbstractGmModel
    An implementation of AbstractGmModel using EM updates on GMMs with diagonal covariances. Inspired by Lawrence Saul's EM code.
